attributes.review: So I looked in the app and saw our golden noodle 🍜 of a president and I am like yo 😷like just why you almost gave me a freaking heart attack🤮😷. Long story short I would not recommend this app it’s live threatening 😵😵And highly annoying 💀🤬🤯😡
attributes.title: Umm🤮

attributes.review: When I open the app the over-ripe orange is dancing- like it looks like a pig found some yummy slop and started hitting the jig.  I’m seriously traumatized. -10/10, would never buy again.
attributes.title: I’m so disappointed 😿😿

attributes.review: Don’t waste your time on this app. Claims to be paid for by Donald Trump, but then requires you to enter in your phone number. Clearly to sell your information to pay for his mcdonald’s addiction.
attributes.title: Waste of time

attributes.review: When ever I try to text trump 2020 but dead it doesn’t let me not to mention that it makes my phone lag so much and makes my TikTok lag so trump work on your app also trump 2020 💅🏽🧚‍♀️🤩but in hell 🤩🧚‍♀️💜💅🏽
attributes.title: Problems

attributes.title: No.

attributes.review: This app glitches too much and I keep seeing too many racist posts. No thankyou. I don’t stand with a Cheeto who has small hands.

attributes.review: This app is the worst thing I have seen in my life. It is so ugly and disgusting, that I might have gone blind. This app needs to be removed immediately. People can no longer suffer from this app. Garbage. Disgusting garbage.
